resources.string: This app listen for changes to the next scheduled alarm, reported by the OS. Decent alarm clock apps will report their next scheduled alarm to the OS. This app will sync the next alarm within an hour from when the next scheduled alarm changes.

Start by editing your connection details for Home Assistant under \"Edit Connection\". Enter hostname, select your access type (long lived API token or webhook) and specify the full entity ID name for your input_datetime input e.g. \"input_datetime.next_alarm\". Read more on how to configure a input_datetime that has both date and time in Home Assistant here: https://github.com/Johboh/hassalarm. If no alarm is scheduled, the default input_datetime value of 1970–01–01 00:00:00 will be published.

For legacy reasons, you can also publish the next alarm as normal sensor using the format yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:00 (for example using entity ID sensor.next_alarm) and also using a API key instead of the recommended long lived token. This app will eventually drop support for this and input_datetime and long lived token will be the only supported way (or any new ways).
Home Assistant configuration help, questions or issues, visit https://github.com/Johboh/hassalarm
Missing Connection data\nPlease Edit the Connection details
Entity ID is legacy sensor instead of input_datetime (see About)
You have unsaved changes. Do you want to discard them?
Entity ID is of type legacy sensor
Entity ID is of type input_datetime

Some applications/phones wrongfully report calendar events or reminders as a next scheduled alarm. The Alarm Manager in Android OS is intended to be used by alarm clocks. This app uses the AlarmManager.getNextAlarmClock() to determine the next scheduled time, but if this is wrongfully set by calendar apps, you can ignore alarms set by those apps. But as there can be only one next alarm set, this app will report no alarm set until the next alarm is an alarm from an app that isn not banned.
To ignore an app, open this view when the next alarm is wrong and add the app to the list of apps to ignore.
Add manual package to ignore list
Next alarm is from an ignored app.
History over all published attempts. Tap rows to show full error string, if available.
